title: Medical App
shortDescription: A medical app to help managing users medical records

features.title: Dental and Hospital Record Management
features.description: Easily record and manage both dental and hospital visits, including admissions and discharges

features.title: Flexible Module Configuration
features.description: Configure the app to use dental, hospital, or both modules based on the healthcare provider's needs

features.title: Comprehensive Visit Tracking
features.description: Track all aspects of patient visits, from initial check-in to final discharge

features.title: Point of Sale Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with existing Point of Sale systems for efficient payment processing
